channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Some FEMA staff call out Trump cuts in public letter of dissent
item.description: More than 180 current and former FEMA employees have published a letter warning of potential disaster due to cuts in the agency.

item.title: Kilmar Abrego Garcia detained by ICE in Baltimore, faces deportation efforts
Some National Guard units in Washington are now carrying firearms in escalation of Trump deployment
